meanings.definition: A type of amine compound found in certain foods.
meanings.sent1: Tyramines can be present in aged cheeses.
meanings.sent2: Some people may be sensitive to tyramines in their diet.
meanings.sent3: The tyramines in the cheese decided to throw a party in my stomach!
meanings.sent4: The tyramines danced around in the food, adding flavor and aroma.
meanings.sent5: Be cautious of tyramines if you have dietary restrictions.
